name: Space Switch Skipper
description:
Made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3, attempting the replicate the Nokia 3310's limitations. 

https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam3

Toggle between two dimensions to hit the extraplanar enemies coming towards your ship. Don't let them reach you or the end of the screen.

Controls:

A - Toggle dimensions to hit enemies.

D - Shoot.

W/Up Arrow - Move Up

S/Down Arrow - Move Down

P - Pause

F - Toggle Fullscreen
